title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1600.4 - Prohibition against discrimination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1600.4 - Prohibition against discrimination

State Regulations

Pursuant to section
223
of the

Public Housing Law, no person shall, because of race, creed, color or national
origin, be subjected to any discrimination by any municipal housing authority
or municipality. The term discrimination shall be deemed to include segregation
or separation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1600.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
